Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
-- Status: OK
@ Part of previous ODC212, which perfoms database updates, see SCR 5825
10.03.2014 GB SCR18685 Removed range of selection in DEBC (removed DEBC_REINSURANCEGRADE = blank)
04.03.2014 GB SCR18685 Changed range of selection in DEBC (added DEBC_REINSURANCEGRADE = blank)
07.02.2014 JH SCR18700 Added update of DEBC_GRADE_AMOUNT
30.01.2014 GB SCR18685 Removed condition DEBC_REINSURANCELIM not null if GSET_YESNO = Y (GSET_ID = 144) from selection DEBC
19.03.2012 JH SCR17204 Added DEBC_REINSURANCECONTRACT and DEBC_REINSURANCEGRADE
13.09.2011 GB SCR16748 Extended condition for selection (for DEBC_REINSURANCE)
22.04.2009 SH SCR14579 Added SILO_ID
16.12.2008 SH SCR14238 Added storing of SILO (SILO_TRIGGER = 10)
29.08.2008 AK SCR13660 set DEBC_REINSURANCELIMEXPIRY to null
27.05.2008 AK SCR13660 del also DEBC_REINSURANCECODE and
DEBC_REINSURANCENUMBER
23.05.2007 SH SCR12542 Changed Task to add DRIH to delete DRIH now
22.05.2007 SH SCR12542 Added PI.TYPE uses as range on DEBC_REINSURANCETYPE
instead of hardcode = 2
22.12.2006 SH SCR12120 Added test on GSET_YESNO (144) to set reinsurance
limits to Null / 0
28.07.2005 SH SCR8425 Fixed bug according to PI.DATE >
DEBC_REINSURANCELIMSTART (added test if DEBC_REINSURANCELIMSTARTalso is null)
23.06.2005 SH SCR8425 Added new parameters PI.COUNTRY, PI.DATE and changed
selection/updates of DEBC
... DBSQL_WhereClause for selection of DEBC/DEBH

ExpSyntax.val: Trim ({0,16})&' and (DEBC_REINSURANCELIMSTART is null or '&''''&DStr ({0,10},'YYYY-MM-DD')&''''&' > DEBC_REINSURANCELIMSTART)'

Text.val: -- Store T203, to inform user that no reinsurance limits were deleted, because
they are still 0.
-- Delete reinsurance-history
-- Update DEBC-Data
... store a row in table SILO to adjust finance
-- Store row to T203, uses in BXA031 for XML report and CSV file
-- Uses to store T203, see T.S., if no reins. limits have to be deleted
-- Increase internal counter, uses for next T203
-- Increase internal counter, uses for next T203

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Reinsurance limits still 0, for the selected client')

Text.val: ... only if all T203 rows were handeld
